phase.keywords_desc:
pre-talk (Actual talk not yet started. Introduction to topic or speaker is going on)
talk (main talk is going on)
post-talk (Main talk is over. Thanks or Q/A is going on.)
phase.category_desc: Which phase of the entire video this snippet belongs to? Only one can be marked.

content.keywords_desc:
animated-intro (Typically before the talk)
dais (when the angle is such that the stage / table chair etc. are visible)
speaker (when speaker is visible)
audience (when audience is visible)
talk-title (title slide of the talk, typically the first one and any other slide which is exactly same as the first one)
break-slide (special slide shown during break)
 slide(when a regular slide is clearly visible)

num-people.category_desc: How many people are being shown?

camera-angle.keywords_desc:
close-up (when a person is being shown above the waist)
inset (when slide and other view are being shown in the same frame)
camera-angle.category_desc: What is the camera angle in the scene?
